ADD2FAITH.value: The Black Cross token is moved forward by 2 spaces!

SHUFFLE_ADD1FAITH.value: The Black Cross token is movedforward by 1 space andall the Solo Action tokens are shuffled!.

DISCARD2GREEN.value: You have to discard 2 Green Development Cards from the bottom of the grid, from the lowest level to the highest (if there are no more Level I cards, you must discard the Level II cards, and so on).

DISCARD2BLUE.value: You have to discard 2 Blue Development Cards from the bottom of the grid, from the lowest level to the highest (if there are no more Level I cards, you must discard the Level II cards, and so on).

DISCARD2YELLOW.value: You have to discard 2 Yellow Development Cards from the bottom of the grid, from the lowest level to the highest (if there are no more Level I cards, you must discard the Level II cards, and so on).

DISCARD2PURPLE.value: You have to discard 2 Purple Development Cards from the bottom of the grid, from the lowest level to the highest (if there are no more Level I cards, you must discard the Level II cards, and so on).
